name: Laserdance (GGJ 2022)
description:
Your living room. Two buttons. Many lasers.

Laserdance is an AR game for Oculus Quest where you try to press two buttons on opposite sides of your room as often as you can, while navigating through an increasingly dense field of deadly lasers.

The game uses the Quest's passthrough mode, and requires players to first map out their room and furniture. Once that's done, lasers will automatically be spawned within that space when the game starts.

prototype made during Global Game Jam 2022
